list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a picture or pattern produced by arranging together small colored pieces of hard material, such as stone, tile, or glass.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the walls and vaults are decorated by marble and mosaic
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bức tường và hầm được trang trí bằng đá cẩm thạch và khảm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an individual (especially an animal) composed of cells of two genetically different types.
a viral disease that results in leaf variegation in tobacco, corn, sugar cane, and other plants.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he mosaicked the walls, ceilings, and floors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh khập khể với những bức tường, trần nhà và sàn nhà
